title: S17 Ep127: Adventures of a Paranormal Investigator w/ Brian J. Cano
itunes:title: Adventures of a Paranormal Investigator w/ Brian J. Cano
description:
Darkness Radio presents: Adventures of a Paranormal Investigator with Paranormal Investigator/Author/TV Star Brian J.Cano!!

Brian joins Darkness Radio today to talk about his new book, "Grains of Sand: Tales of a Paranormal Life". Brian shares tales of his extensive paranormal history, how his theories have changed over the years, the evolution of the paranormal TV industry, and how his career evolved from  public relations firm to paranormal investigations on television!

Get Brian's new book, "Grains of Sand..." here: https://amzn.to/3TA3iZZ

Check out everything Brian here:   https://www.neverstopsearching.com/

Support the History of the Paranormal exhibit and Brian here:  https://www.patreon.com/brianjcano

Check out our new site, https://www.darknessradioshow.com/ to find all of our old archives, leave us a voice message for parashare, read our blogs, and much more!
